ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] vale
ygData.msgSnippet: Tork, Take care my friend.  Unfortunately with all the changes lately I may be hot on your heals in your departure.  EQ is going downhill fast and Verant isn t
ygData.messageBody:
Tork,

Take care my friend. Unfortunately with all the changes lately I may be hot
on your heals in your departure. EQ is going downhill fast and Verant isn't
helping any. The game is becoming boring and Verant is nerfing things left
and right on top of it, which is only accelerating the process.

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Tork" <tork_dropbox@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 12:05 PM
Subject: [eqbards] vale


> I know I wasn't the most prolific poster to the list, but I wanted to
thank
> everyone for the list; its been a great source of information sure, but
the
> community aspect has been invaluable both in and out of EQ. I know of no
> other EQ group which has bonded like eqbards, and to a lesser degree the
> concert hall; I am truly proud to have been among the ranks.
>
> In parting, I bid you all take care, have fun.
>
> Sincerely,
> -Tork@Nameless
> though much sacrifice, forever 50th Wood Elf Bard
> Legacy of Steel
>
>
